advice: Educate yourselves on the software development process.
cons: Management does not really understand software development.
pros: Some fruits once in a while.
text: Pros Some fruits once in a while. Opportunity to try out new technologies. Office parties. Good starting expat job, they help with visa process. Cons Management does not really understand software development. You have to work more than 8 hours per day or you get a scandal from management. Random deadlines pop up for no reason. Pressure from management is sometimes non-existing but sometimes hardcore. (stressful). I would say if you are not a very quality focused individual, not processed focused, you will be fine. Advice to Management Educate yourselves on the software development process.
title: Right in the middle

advice: set up your own priorities and then expect that from people.
pros: some of the teams are nice
text: Pros some of the teams are nice Cons - small payments - expected over hours - constant priority change - lots of people come and go Advice to Management set up your own priorities and then expect that from people.
